question_text: Are default passwords always changed before installing a system on the network?
expected_testing: Interview personnel - Review configuration standards - Examine configuration settings

question_text: Are all unnecessary default accounts removed or disabled before installing a system on the network?
expected_testing: Interview personnel - Review configuration standards - Examine accounts

question_text: Is non-console administrative access encrypted using strong cryptography?
Is strong cryptography used to safeguard cardholder data during transmission over open public networks?
Are all users assigned a unique ID before allowing them to access system components?
expected_testing: Interview personnel - Examine user ID lists

question_text: Is user identity verified before modifying any authentication credential?
Do passwords/passphrases meet the following minimum strength requirements: at least seven characters long AND contain both numeric and alphabetic characters?
Are user passwords/passphrases changed at least every 90 days?
Is an individual prevented from submitting a new password/passphrase that is the same as any of the last four passwords/passphrases used?
Is multi-factor authentication implemented for all remote network access originating from outside the entity's network that could access or impact the cardholder data environment?
Are shared user IDs for system administration and other critical functions prohibited?
expected_testing: Interview personnel - Review user ID lists

question_text: Are appropriate facility entry controls used to limit and monitor physical access to systems in the cardholder data environment?
expected_testing: Observe facility entry controls - Interview personnel

question_text: Are all media physically secured (including computers - removable electronic media - paper receipts - paper reports - and faxes)?
expected_testing: Observe physical security controls - Interview personnel

question_text: Is strict control maintained over the internal or external distribution of any kind of media?
Is strict control maintained over the storage and accessibility of media?
Is all media destroyed when it is no longer needed for business or legal reasons?
Are card-present POI devices protected from tampering and substitution?
expected_testing: Observe POI device handling - Interview personnel

question_text: Is training provided for personnel to be aware of attempted tampering or replacement of devices?
Are deployed card-present POI devices periodically inspected to detect tampering or substitution?
Is a usage policy for critical technologies developed and implemented? Does it explicitly require user acknowledgment?
Are all anomalies and exceptions noted during the review of security logs followed up and resolved?
Is the service provider required to maintain documented policies and procedures per PCI DSS Requirements 12.1 through 12.5?
expected_testing: Review service provider agreements - Examine documentation
